main event: A civilian reported observing 7 unidentified objects over Oklahoma City for approximately 7 minutes on March 30, 1967.
interesting points: The objects were described as round lights changing from red to white and back to red., The size of the objects was estimated to be twice that of Venus., The objects appeared to travel at twice the speed of common jet aircraft., There was no apparent formation among the objects as they moved., The observer was a housewife, and the observation location was near Wiley Post Airport.
sighted object: seven round lights in the sky
